description: A delectable snack of creamy baked brie and tender asparagus wrapped in crisp puff pastry and topped with a drizzle of honey dressing.
keywords: Savoury pastry,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Asparagus,Sesame free,Sep 2022,Peanut free
name: Asparagus & Cheese Puff Pastries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sheet ready-rolled frozen puff pastry, partially thawed
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Cook asparagus in a saucepan of boiling water for 30 seconds or until just tender. Drain. Rinse under cold water. Drain well.

Quarter pastry to form 4 squares. Place squares on tray. Top centre of each square with brie and asparagus. Brush pastry edges with a little egg, then fold over to enclose filling. Brush pastry with egg. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and crisp.
Meanwhile, place remaining ingredients in a small bowl and whisk to combine. Season with pepper. Serve puff pastries with honey dressing.
